snippet.title: Bellwright - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
After traveling scorched lands, you find a place to call your new home. Grow from a humble shepherd to a great liberator of the lands and fight against the oppression of the Crown. Bellwright is an upcoming survival game.

Rate the game: https://gameoneer.com/bellwright/

Join Gameoneer Discord community for PC game news, discussions, co-op: https://discord.gg/WSjyznqKbk

Follow game news on Twitter: https://twitter.com/GameoneerGaming
